DOC.criteria: 1. lumbar spondylolisthesis 2. symptom low back pain and/or neurogenic claudication without radiculopathy referable lumbar spine , 3. least 3 month fail conservative therapy 1. multilevel lumbar degenerative diseases 2. history previous lumbar surgery
